title: Political Participation and Advocacy in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What type of political system does Timor-Leste have?

choices: One woman for every two candidates
One woman for every three candidates
questions.answer: One woman for every three candidates

choices: To reflect the overall distribution of votes in parliament
questions.answer: To reflect the overall distribution of votes in parliament
